channel.title: Fighting on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Fighting on Game6r

item.title: Punch X Punch
item.description: Before starting the Minecraft Fighting game, you will be able to choose a character. They differ from each other only in gender. Everything else is the same. From the equipment - a shield and a sword. This is quite enough to travel through the underworld and crush zombies attacking from all sides. Sometimes there are especially strong freaks that you have to tinker with.
